refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gwcrontab is a simple remote frontend to the Windows atsvc service. This service performs the same tasks as at and cron do on POSIX systems.
The GUI is aimed to look similar to the "Planning Tasks" application in Windows.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: This utility is part of the Samba suite, which is developed by the global Samba Team.
This manpage and gwcrontab were written by Jelmer Vernooij.
